name: Unreal Engine Demonstration
description:
Showcase of Unreal Engine Toolset

This includes crowd simulations, AI melee and movement, dynamic materials, water effect, different camera angles, particle effects and sky sphere colours in use. 

Standard movement controls, when camera changes, use the 1 key to go back to the original camera. 

Journey through the rubble of a destroyed castle after an extensive and exhaustive battle. Feel the effects of the bloodshed that took place as you finish off your enemies and then go through the castle ruins and into the streets where there is a public execution taking place
